verses.verse: <S%G1161>But<s%> there <S%G1096>were<s%> false <S%G5578>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> there shall <S%G2071>be<s%> false <S%G5572>teachers<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3748>who<s%> privily shall bring <S%G3919>in<s%> <S%G684>damnable<s%> <S%G139>heresies<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G720>denying<s%> the <S%G1203>Lord<s%> that <S%G59>bought<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, and <S%G1863>bring<s%> upon <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G5031>swift<s%> <S%G684>destruction<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G1811>follow<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> pernicious <S%G684>ways<s%>; by reason <S%G1223>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G225>truth<s%> shall be evil spoken <S%G987>of<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G4124>covetousness<s%> shall they with <S%G4112>feigned<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> make <S%G1710>merchandise<s%> of <S%G5209>you<s%>: <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%> now of a long <S%G1597>time<s%> <S%G691>lingereth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G684>damnation<s%> <S%G3573>slumbereth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5339>spared<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> that <S%G264>sinned<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> cast them down to <S%G5020>hell<s%>, and <S%G3860>delivered<s%> them into <S%G4577>chains<s%> of <S%G2217>darkness<s%>, to be <S%G5083>reserved<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5339>spared<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5442>saved<s%> <S%G3575>Noah<s%> the <S%G3590>eighth<s%> person, a <S%G2783>preacher<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, bringing <S%G1863>in<s%> the <S%G2627>flood<s%> upon the <S%G2889>world<s%> of the <S%G765>ungodly<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5077>turning<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> of <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1116>Gomorrha<s%> into <S%G5077>ashes<s%> <S%G2632>condemned<s%> them with an <S%G2692>overthrow<s%>, <S%G5087>making<s%> them an <S%G5262>ensample<s%> unto those that after <S%G3195>should<s%> live <S%G764>ungodly<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4506>delivered<s%> <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G3091>Lot<s%>, <S%G2669>vexed<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> the <S%G766>filthy<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> the <S%G113>wicked<s%>:

<S%G1063>(For<s%> that righteous <S%G1342>man<s%> <S%G1460>dwelling<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, in <S%G990>seeing<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G189>hearing<s%>, <S%G928>vexed<s%> his <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> from <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1537>to<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> with their <S%G459>unlawful<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%>;)

The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth<s%> how to <S%G4506>deliver<s%> the <S%G2152>godly<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3986>temptations<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> to <S%G5083>reserve<s%> the <S%G94>unjust<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment<s%> to be <S%G2849>punished<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3122>chiefly<s%> them that <S%G4198>walk<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1939>lust<s%> of <S%G3394>uncleanness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2706>despise<s%> <S%G2963>government<s%>. <S%G5113>Presumptuous<s%> are they, <S%G829>selfwilled<s%>, they are <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5141>afraid<s%> to speak <S%G987>evil<s%> of <S%G1391>dignities<s%>.

<S%G3699>Whereas<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%>, which <S%G5607>are<s%> greater <S%G3187>in<s%> <S%G2479>power<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1411>might<s%>, <S%G5342>bring<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G989>railing<s%> <S%G2920>accusation<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3844>before<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G249>brute<s%> <S%G2226>beasts<s%>, <S%G1080>made<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> be <S%G259>taken<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5356>destroyed<s%>, speak <S%G987>evil<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> the things <S%G3739>that<s%> they understand <S%G50>not<s%>; and shall utterly <S%G2704>perish<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G5356>corruption<s%>;

And shall <S%G2865>receive<s%> the <S%G3408>reward<s%> of <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%>, as they that <S%G2233>count<s%> it <S%G2237>pleasure<s%> to <S%G5172>riot<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the day <S%G2250>time<s%>. <S%G4696>Spots<s%> they are <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3470>blemishes<s%>, sporting <S%G1792>themselves<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G539>deceivings<s%> while they <S%G4910>feast<s%> with <S%G5213>you<s%>;

<S%G2192>Having<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G3428>adultery<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that cannot cease <S%G180>from<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>; <S%G1185>beguiling<s%> <S%G793>unstable<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%>: an <S%G2588>heart<s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1128>exercised<s%> with covetous <S%G4124>practices<s%>; <S%G2671>cursed<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%>:

Which have <S%G2641>forsaken<s%> the <S%G2117>right<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%>, and are gone <S%G4105>astray<s%>, <S%G1811>following<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam<s%> the son of <S%G1007>Bosor<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G3408>wages<s%> of <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%>;

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2192>was<s%> <S%G1649>rebuked<s%> for <S%G2398>his<s%> <S%G3892>iniquity<s%>: the <S%G880>dumb<s%> <S%G5268>ass<s%> <S%G5350>speaking<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G2967>forbad<s%> the <S%G3913>madness<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>.

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G4077>wells<s%> without <S%G504>water<s%>, <S%G3507>clouds<s%> that are <S%G1643>carried<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> a <S%G2978>tempest<s%>; to <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2217>mist<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%> is <S%G5083>reserved<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> when they <S%G5350>speak<s%> great <S%G5246>swelling<s%> words of <S%G3153>vanity<s%>, they <S%G1185>allure<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, through much <S%G766>wantonness<s%>, those that were <S%G3689>clean<s%> <S%G668>escaped<s%> from them who <S%G390>live<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4106>error<s%>.

While they <S%G1861>promise<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1657>liberty<s%>, they <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G5225>are<s%> the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G5356>corruption<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> is <S%G2274%G2532>overcome<s%>, of the <S%G5129>same<s%> is he brought in <S%G1402>bondage<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> after they have <S%G668>escaped<s%> the <S%G3393>pollutions<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4990>Saviour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, they <S%G1707>are<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1707>entangled<s%> <S%G5125>therein<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1096%G2274>overcome<s%>, the latter <S%G2078>end<s%> is <S%G5501>worse<s%> with <S%G846>them<s%> than the <S%G4413>beginning<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> it had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> for <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to have <S%G1921>known<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, <S%G2228>than<s%>, after they have <S%G1921>known<s%> it, to <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> it is <S%G4819>happened<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> according <S%G3588>to<s%> the <S%G227>true<s%> <S%G3942>proverb<s%>, The <S%G2965>dog<s%> is <S%G1994>turned<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1829>vomit<s%> <S%G1994>again<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5300>sow<s%> that was <S%G3068>washed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> her <S%G2946>wallowing<s%> in the <S%G1004>mire<s%>.
